typography.fontFamily: System default sans-serif (e.g., PingFang SC, Noto Sans CJK SC, or similar)

spacing.gutterRules: Consistent vertical spacing between sections and horizontal padding within containers, often multiples of 8px.

layoutPrinciples.gridUsage: Single-column layout for primary content, with clear sectioning.
layoutPrinciples.alignmentRules: Left-aligned content and labels, right-aligned values/data points within a row.
layoutPrinciples.breakpointBehavior: Designed for mobile portrait orientation, implying fluid width and stacking for larger screens (though not explicitly shown).

visualHierarchy.fontSizes: Larger, bolder text for titles and key information, smaller for details and labels.
visualHierarchy.contrast: High contrast for text (dark on light background) to ensure readability.
visualHierarchy.emphasisMechanisms: Bold text for important labels, distinct background colors for sections (e.g., white cards on a light gray background), subtle use of green for positive actions/icons.

header.top-bar: Light background, dark text, centered title, clear back arrow and action icons.

components.cards: White background, rounded corners, subtle shadow, consistent internal padding, used to group related information.
components.list-items: Clear separation between items, consistent padding, labels on left, values on right.

buttons.floating-action-button: Circular, solid green background, white icon, subtle shadow, positioned at bottom right.
buttons.bottom-navigation: Icons with text labels, active item highlighted with green color.

components.icons: Outline style, monochromatic (gray or green for active states).

otherAttributes.corner-radius: Small (e.g., 8px - 12px) for cards and main content blocks.
otherAttributes.shadowStyle: Subtle, soft shadows for cards and floating action buttons to provide depth.
otherAttributes.borderStyle: Minimal borders, primarily for subtle separation of sections or list items.
otherAttributes.status-bar: Standard mobile status bar styling (dark icons on light background).
